sample_docs: We provide solutions that enable organizations to seamlessly capture, onboard, verify and digitize identities of customers and their documents in real time View Solutions We provide solutions that enable organizations to seamlessly capture, onboard, verify and digitize identities of customers and their documents in real time Our solutions allow organizations to seamlessly capture, on-board and verify identities of customers in real time. View Solutions Our solutions allow organizations to seamlessly capture, on-board and verify identities of customers in real time. Our KYC suite of cloud and mobile software are powerful and flexible for increased productivity Let's Talk Our KYC suite of cloud and mobile software are powerful and flexible for increased productivity Do more on our biometric data capture platform for census and enumeration, with a geolocation feature that lets you know the source of your data on the go. Meet regulatory KYC requirements and business on-boarding objectives with our robust SIM Registration System for mobile operators Let your employees clock-in their arrival at your office locations in a fun way. Get reports, boost employee engagement and productivity exponentially. Confirm 'real' identities of individuals, match them against multiple databases of certified government organizations. What Our Customers Are Saying The timing of the release of the Bioregistra product by Seamfix was just-in-time. CloudCover had just identified the need to carry out a know your customer (KYC) process before onboarding any customer and integrating with their platform via provided APIs was seamless with the modular design of our systems. Today, Bioregistra powers an integral part of our business process(Bioregistra) - Martins Ebiri Group infrastructure and systems manager, CloudCover We appreciate your work because the entire work done by your team, as well as the selfless support rendered are exceptional. Due to your company's efforts, enthusiasm and commitment, our organization was able to achieve remarkable results within a relatively short time.
